import {Tabs} from 'nextra/components'

# Getting Started

## Git

- [macos](https://git-scm.com/downloads/mac)
- [windows](https://git-scm.com/downloads/win)

### Lazygit

- [github](https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit?tab=readme-ov-file#homebrew)


<Tabs items={['macos', 'win']}>
  <Tabs.Tab>
    ```shell
    brew install jesseduffield/lazygit/lazygit
    brew install lazygit
    ```
  </Tabs.Tab>
  <Tabs.Tab>
    ```shell
    choco install lazygit
    ```
  </Tabs.Tab>
</Tabs>



## Neovim

```shell
brew install neovim
```

### Lazyvim

- [guide](https://www.lazyvim.org/installation)

## zsh

### Install `zsh` theme `lambda-gitster` from my fork.

```sh
git clone https://github.com/mym0404/lambda-gitster.git
cd lambda-gitster
cp lambda-gitster.zsh-theme ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/themes
```

## Bat

- [github](https://github.com/sharkdp/bat)

```shell
brew instlal bat
```

## Figlet

```shell
brew install figlet
```
